You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE
Configure Product Info and Options on the Shopping Cart Page

Provide an efficient, helpful experience for buyers as they review the products in their shopping cart and prepare to check out. You can specify how much information and which options are available for each product listed on the Shopping Cart page.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS

Salesforce Compatibility

Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.




B2B Commerce Compatibility

B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10)


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To access CC Admin and change settings:	Access B2B Commerce for Visualforce Admin Settings permission set

You can configure whether the following options are available for each product:

An Additional Info link (1) that opens a window with more product information.
A Comments link (2) that opens a window, where the buyer can add text associated with the line item in the cart.
NOTE By default, these comments don't appear elsewhere on the storefront. You can send the comments to an external system for processing as part of order fulfillment.

A bundle, kit, or dynamic kit also provides an Included Items link (3), which opens a window that lists the included component products. This link and the content of the Included Items window aren't configurable.

In the Additional Info window, you can also specify whether the product SKU (4) and short description (5) appear:

NOTE When you enable Cart Scale in B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13), the Scaled Cart page replaces the Shopping Cart page version 2.0 but still respects these options. The configurations described in this topic still apply to the Scaled Cart page.

To configure the product information and options on the Shopping Cart page, update your storefront configuration settings.

On the CC Admin tab in your org, select your storefront (1).
In the Storefront Settings menu, select Configuration Settings (2).
From the Module picklist, select Cart (3).
To show the Comments link and window for a buyer, find the Show Comments configuration (4), and make sure that its value is TRUE (5).
TIP
If the value is FALSE, click Override in the Action column. Enter TRUE for Value, and click Create.
If the configuration doesn't exist, click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Cart
Configuration	Show Comments
Page	all
Value	TRUE
To show the Additional Info link and window, find the Show Additional Info configuration (6), and make sure that its value is TRUE (7).
TIP
If the value is FALSE, click Override in the Action column. Enter TRUE for Value, and click Create.
If the configuration doesn't exist, click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Cart
Configuration	Show Additional Info
Page	all
Value	TRUE
If you're showing the Additional Info window, specify which information to include.
To show the product SKU, find the Display SKU On Additional Info configuration (8), and make sure that its value is TRUE (9).
TIP
If the value is FALSE, click Override in the Action column. Enter TRUE for Value, and click Create.
If the configuration doesn't exist, click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Cart
Configuration	Display SKU On Additional Info
Page	all
Value	TRUE
To show the product short description, find the Display Short Desc configuration (10), and make sure that its value is TRUE (11).
TIP
If the value is FALSE, click Override in the Action column. Enter TRUE for Value, and click Create.
If the configuration doesn't exist, click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Cart
Configuration	Display Short Desc
Page	all
Value	TRUE
Build and activate a new configuration cache.

title: Configure Product Info on Shopping Cart Page
